","type":"text/plain"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/readme","text":"Installation and usage tutorial is available at [[Tidme Manual|https://oflg.github.io/Tidme/manual/#Included%20plugins]].

可在 [[墨屉手册|https://oflg.github.io/Tidme/manual/zh-Hans#相关插件]] 查看安装使用教程。","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/actions/selection":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/actions/selection","code-body":"yes","text":"<$let
    story=<<dom-data-story>>
    history=<<dom-data-history>>
    popup-title=<<dom-data-popup-title>>
>
    <$action-deletetiddler
        $tiddler=<<story>>
    />
    <$action-deletetiddler
        $tiddler=<<history>>
    />
    <$action-setfield
        $tiddler=<<selection_popup_title>>
        text=""
    />
    <$action-setfield
        $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text"
        text={{{ [<selection>jsonget[chunks],[0],[text]] }}}
    />
    <$action-setfield
        $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/prefix"
        text={{{ [<selection>jsonget[chunks],[0],[prefix]] }}}
    />
    <$action-setfield
        $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/suffix"
        text={{{ [<selection>jsonget[chunks],[0],[suffix]] }}}
    />
    <$let
        selectionText={{{ [<selection>jsonget[chunks],[0],[text]] }}}
        selectionTrim={{{ [<selectionText>trim[]] }}}
        selectionTrimLowercase={{{ [<selectionTrim>lowercase[]] }}}
        selectionTrimTitlecase={{{ [<selectionTrim>titlecase[]] }}}
        selectionTrimUppercase={{{ [<selectionTrim>uppercase[]] }}}
    >
        <$list
            filter="[<selectionTrim>!is[blank]]"
            variable="selectionTrim"
        >
            <$action-popup
                $state=<<popup-title>>
                $coords=<<tv-selection-coords>>
                $floating="yes"
            />
            {{$:/plugins/tidme/read/actions/story}}
        </$list>
    </$let>
</$let>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/actions/startup":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/actions/startup","tags":"$:/tags/StartupAction","text":"<$list
    filter="[{$:/config/Dynannotate/SelectionTracker/Enable}!match[yes]]"
    variable="ignore"
>
    <$action-setfield
        $tiddler="$:/config/Dynannotate/SelectionTracker/Enable"
        $value="yes"
    />
</$list>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/actions/story":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/actions/story","code-body":"yes","text":"<$navigator
    story=<<story>>
    history=<<history>>
    openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}}
    openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}}
    relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}
>
    <$list
        filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]annotate-text<selectionText>] [all[shadows+tiddlers]annotate-text<selectionTrim>] [all[shadows+tiddlers]word<selectionTrim>] [all[shadows+tiddlers]word<selectionTrimLowercase>] [all[shadows+tiddlers]word<selectionTrimTitlecase>] [all[shadows+tiddlers]word<selectionTrimUppercase>] +[!is[draft]!<studyTiddler>has[title]]"
    >
        <$action-navigate $scroll="no"/>
    </$list>
</$navigator>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/close":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/close","icon":"$:/core/images/close-button","caption":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/close}}","description":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/closetip}}","condition":"[{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}trim[]]","text":"<$action-deletetiddler
    $tiddler=<<story>>
/>
<$action-deletetiddler
    $tiddler=<<history>>
/>
<$action-deletetiddler
    $tiddler=<<selection_popup_title>>
/>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/sentence":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/sentence","tags":"$:/tags/TidmeRead/annotation","icon":"$:/core/images/add-comment","caption":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/sentence}}","description":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/sentencetip}}","condition":"[{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}trim[]]","text":"<$action-createtiddler
    $basetitle={{{ [{$:/language/tidme/read/sentence}] [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}trim[]search-replace:g:regexp[\n],[]split[]first[13]join[]] +[join[/]]}}}
    tags={{{ [<studyTiddler>format:titlelist[]addsuffix[ .]] }}}
    caption="{{||$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/sentence}}"
    text={{{ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}trim[]] }}}
    annotate-text={{{ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}] }}}
    annotate-prefix={{{ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/prefix}split[]last[13]join[]] }}}
    annotate-suffix={{{ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/suffix}split[]first[13]join[]] }}}
    annotate-colour="LightSkyBlue"
>
    <$action-navigate
        $to=<<createTiddler-title>>
        $scroll="no"
    />
</$action-createtiddler>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/word":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/word","tags":"$:/tags/TidmeRead/annotation","icon":"$:/core/images/help","caption":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/word}}","description":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/wordtip}}","condition":"[{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}trim[]]","text":"<$action-createtiddler
    $basetitle={{{ [{$:/language/tidme/read/word}] [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}trim[]search-replace:g:regexp[\n],[]] +[join[/]]}}}
    tags={{{ [<studyTiddler>format:titlelist[]addsuffix[ ?]] }}}
    caption=`! {{!!word}}

${ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/prefix}split[.]split[。]last[]] }$ ''${ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}] }$'' ${ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/suffix}split[.]split[。]first[]] }$`
    text="{{||$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/word}}"
    word={{{ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}trim[]] }}}
    annotate-text={{{ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text}] }}}
    annotate-prefix={{{ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/prefix}split[]last[13]join[]] }}}
    annotate-suffix={{{ [{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/suffix}split[]first[13]join[]] }}}
    annotate-colour="LightSkyBlue"
>
    <$action-navigate
        $to=<<createTiddler-title>>
        $scroll="no"
    />
</$action-createtiddler>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"<svg width="22pt" height="22pt" class="tc-image-button" viewBox="0 0 128 128">

    transform: scale(0.7);
    transform-origin: top left;
    overflow-y:hidden;
    user-select:none;
}

.tmc-annotation-wrapper .tc-drop-down button{
    padding: 7px 14px;;
}

.tmc-book h1 .tc-toc-caption.tc-tiny-gap-left {
    display: none;
}"},"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-text":{"title":"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-text","text":"hide"},"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-prefix":{"title":"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-prefix","text":"hide"},"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-suffix":{"title":"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-suffix","text":"hide"},"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/twpub":{"title":"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/twpub","text":"hide"},"$:/config/Tidme/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilters/read":{"title":"$:/config/Tidme/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilters/read","code-body":"yes","list-before":"$:/config/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilters/default","list-after":"$:/config/Tidme/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilters/card","tags":"$:/tags/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilter","text":"[subfilter{$:/config/Tidme/Filters/decktiddler}then[$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/tiddler]]"},"$:/config/Tidme/Libraries/twpub":{"title":"$:/config/Tidme/Libraries/twpub","caption":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/twpublibrary}}","library-type":"twpub","url":"https://twpub-tools.org/library/","text":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/twpublibrarytip}}"},"$:/Deck/read":{"title":"$:/Deck/read","tags":"$:/tags/TidmeDeck","caption":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/read}}","description":"{{$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/import}}","card":"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[.]]","card_unfold":"[tag[.]]","card_exclude":"[tag[!]]","order":"due-new","order_learn":"[sort[due]]","order_new":"[sortan[title]]","order_due":"[sort[due]]","exclude_action":"{{$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/buttons/action/exclude}}","unfold_action":"{{$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/buttons/action/unfold}}","leech_threshold":"8","leech_action":"{{$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/buttons/action/exclude}}","state_learn":"[state[1]] message="tm-close-tiddler"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-unload-plugin-library" url={{!!url}}/><$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$:/temp/ServerConnection/$(PluginLibraryURL)$][prefix[$:/temp/RemoteAssetInfo/$(PluginLibraryURL)$]"/>{{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}}</$button>","subtitle":"<$transclude field="caption"/>","text":"\import $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Modals/AddPlugins

\define display-plugin-info(type)
<div class="twpub-badge">
    <div class="twpub-badge-cover">
        <$list filter="[<assetInfo>has[cover-image-url]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage="{{$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/default-book-cover}}">
            <img src={{{ [<assetInfo>get[cover-image-url]] }}}/>
        </$list>
    </div>
    <div class="twpub-badge-text">
        <div class="twpub-badge-title">
            <$text
                text={{{ [<assetInfo>get[epub-title]] }}}
            />
        </div>
        <div class="twpub-badge-author">
            <$text
                text={{{ [<assetInfo>get[epub-creator]] }}}
            />
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="twpub-badge-install">
        <<install-plugin-button>>
    </div>
</div>
\end

\define install-plugin-actions()
\whitespace trim
<$let
    url={{!!url}}
    title={{$(assetInfo)$!!original-title}}
    title-twpub={{$(assetInfo)$!!epub-title}}
    card-text="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[__title__/toc]]"
    card={{{ [<card-text>search-replace[__title__],<title>] }}}
>
    <$action-sendmessage
        $message="tm-load-plugin-from-library"
        title=<<title>>
        url=<<url>>
    />
    <$action-createtiddler
        $basetitle={{{ [[$:/Deck/read/]addsuffix<title-twpub>] }}}
        $template="$:/Deck/default"
        $overwrite="yes"
        caption=<<title-twpub>>
        description=""
        card=<<card>>
        card_unfold="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/twpub/]] [tag[.]]"
        order_due="[sortan[]]"
        order_new="[sortan[]]"
        twpub=<<title>>
    />
    <$let
        currentTiddler=<<assetInfo>>
    >
        <$list
            filter="[enlist{!!dependents}] [{!!parent-plugin}] +[sort[name]]"
            variable="dependency"
        >
            <$action-sendmessage
                $message="tm-load-plugin-from-library"
                url=<<url>>
                title=<<dependency>>
            />
        </$list>
    </$let>
</$let>
\end

<<display-server-assets "plugin">>
"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/badge":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/badge","code-body":"yes","text":"<$button
    class="twpub-badge"
>
    <$let
        deckTiddler={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TidmeDeck]twpub<currentTiddler>] }}}
        card=`[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$(currentTiddler)$/toc]]`
    >
        <$list
            filter="[<deckTiddler>!is[blank]]"
        >
            <$action-navigate/>
        </$list>
        <div class="twpub-badge-cover">
            <$list
                filter="[<currentTiddler>has[cover-image]]"
                variable="ignore"
                emptyMessage="{{$:/TWPUB/default-book-cover}}"
            >
                <$transclude
                    tiddler=<<currentTiddler>>
                    subtiddler={{!!cover-image}}
                />
            </$list>
        </div>
        <div class="twpub-badge-text">
            <div class="twpub-badge-title">
                <$text
                    text={{!!epub-title}}
                />
            </div>
            <div class="twpub-badge-author">
                <$text
                    text={{!!epub-creator}}
                />
            </div>
        </div>
        <$reveal
            default=<<deckTiddler>>
            type="match"
            text=""
            tag="div"
            class="twpub-badge-install"
        >
            <$button
                class="tc-btn-invisible tc-install-plugin"
            >
                <$action-createtiddler
                    $basetitle={{{ [[$:/Deck/read/]addsuffix{!!epub-title}] }}}
                    $template="$:/Deck/default"
                    $overwrite="yes"
                    caption={{!!epub-title}}
                    description=""
                    card=<<card>>
                    card_unfold="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/twpub/]] [tag[.]]"
                    order_due="[sortan[]]"
                    order_new="[sortan[]]"
                    twpub=<<currentTiddler>>
                />
                {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Update/Caption}}
            </$button>
        </$reveal>
    </$let>
</$button>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/import":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/import","text":"<center>
    [img height=60 tooltip={{$:/language/tidme/read/twpubtip}} [$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/logo]]
    <div>
        <$text text={{$:/language/tidme/read/twpub}}/>
    </div>
    <$list
        filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]library-type[twpub]]"
    >
        <div>
            <$button
                class="twpub-library-button"
                tooltip={{$:/language/tidme/read/importtwpub}}
            >
                <$action-sendmessage
                    $message="tm-load-plugin-library"
                    url={{!!url}}
                    infoTitlePrefix="$:/temp/RemoteAssetInfo/"
                />
                <$action-sendmessage
                    $message="tm-modal"
                    $param="$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/add"
                    currentTiddler=<<currentTiddler>>
                />
                {{$:/core/images/download-button}} ''<$transclude tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> field="caption"/>''
            </$button>
        </div>
    </$list>
    <$list
        filter="[all[tiddlers]plugin-type[plugin]has[epub-title]sort[]]"
            template="$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/badge"
            storyview="pop"
        />
</center>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/logo":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/twpub/logo","type":"image/svg+xml","text":"<svg width="274.89758px" height="135.86716px" viewBox="0 0 274.89758 135.86716" version="1.1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

/* Badge */

.twpub-badge {
	width: 100%;
	text-align: left;
	border: 1px solid <<color muted-foreground>>;
	background: <<colour background>>;
	fill: <<color muted-foreground>>;
	padding: 0.5em;
	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
	<<box-shadow "1px 1px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)">>
	margin: 0.5em 0;
	border-radius: 4px;
}

.twpub-badge.tc-popup-handle,
.twpub-badge:hover {
	background: <<colour primary>>;
	color: <<colour background>>;
	fill: <<color background>>;
}

.twpub-badge-icon {
	padding-right: 0.5em;
}

.twpub-badge:hover .twpub-badge-icon {
}

.twpub-badge .twpub-badge-icon svg {
	width: 2em;
	height: 2em;
	vertical-align: middle;
}

.twpub-badge-text {
	display: flex;
	padding-left: 0.5em;
	flex-grow: 1;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.twpub-badge-title {
	font-weight: bold;
}

.twpub-badge-author {

}

.twpub-badge-cover {
}

.twpub-badge-cover img {
	height: 4em;
	width: auto;
	vertical-align: middle;
}

/* Library */

.twpub-library-button {
	padding: 4px 8px;
	margin: 4px 0;
	border: none;
	cursor: pointer;
	background: <<colour download-background>>;
	border-radius: 1em;
	color: <<colour download-foreground>>;
	fill: <<colour download-foreground>>;
}

.twpub-library-button svg {
	vertical-align: bottom;
}

/* Search results */

.twpub-search-results {
	white-space: normal;
}

.twpub-search-results a.tc-tiddlylink.twpub-search-result {
	padding: 0.5em 0;
	border-radius: 0.25em;
}

/* Image gallery */

.twpub-image-gallery-item-wrapper {
	display: inline-block;
	width: 100px;
	height: 100px;
}

.twpub-image-gallery-item {
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	object-fit: contain;
}

/* Tiddler fields dropdown */

.tc-tiddler-fields-button {
	 position: relative;
	 display: inline-block;
}

.tc-tiddler-fields-button .tc-drop-down {
	font-size: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/fontsize}};
	line-height: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/lineheight}};
	word-wrap: break-word;
}

.tc-tiddler-fields-button .tc-drop-down .tc-view-field-table {
	margin-top: 0;
	margin-bottom: 0;
}

.tc-tiddler-fields-button .tc-drop-down .tc-view-field-table,
.tc-tiddler-fields-button .tc-drop-down .tc-view-field-table th,
.tc-tiddler-fields-button .tc-drop-down .tc-view-field-table td {
	border: none;
}"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/bodytext":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/bodytext","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","list-after":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body","code-body":"yes","text":"<$reveal

</$reveal>
"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/toc":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/toc","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","list-after":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body","code-body":"yes","text":"\define link-actions()
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-scroll" selector={{{ [<navigateTo>escapecss[]addprefix[#]] }}}/>
\end

<$list
    filter="[<currentTiddler>has[twpub]]"
>
    <div class="tmc-book">
        <$linkcatcher actions=<<link-actions>> >
            <$macrocall
                $name="toc-tabbed-internal-nav"
                tag={{{ [{!!twpub}addsuffix[/toc]] }}}
                sort="sortan[]"

                selectedTiddler={{{ [<currentTiddler>addsuffix[/read]] }}}
                unselectedText={{$:/language/tidme/read/preview}}
            />
        </$linkcatcher>
    </div>
</$list>

<$action-sendmessage
    $message="tm-scroll"
    selector={{{ [<navigateTo>escapecss[]addprefix[#]] }}}
/>
\end

<$linkcatcher
    actions=<<link-actions>>
>
    <$let
        twpub={{{ [<currentTiddler>split[/toc/]first[]] }}}

        target-next={{{ [<currentTiddler>split[-]butlast[]] [<currentTiddler>split[-]last[]add[1]] +[join[-]get[target]else<last-chunks>] }}}
    >
        <$list
            filter="[<currentTiddler>shadowsource[]plugintiddlers[]sortan[]allafter:include{!!target}allbefore:include<target-next>]"
        >
            <$set name="state" value={{{ [[$:/state/viewtemplate/visibility/]addsuffix<currentTiddler>] }}}>
                <$reveal stateTitle=<<state>> type="nomatch" text="" default="" tag="div">
                    <div class="tc-dynaview-track-tiddler-when-visible" data-dynaview-track-tiddler=<<state>> >

                            <$transclude
                                mode="inline"

                        </a>

                </$reveal>
                <$reveal stateTitle=<<state>> type="match" text="" default="" tag="div">

                    </div>
                </$reveal>
            </$set>
        </$list>
    </$let>

\define click-excerpt-actions()
<$action-deletetiddler
    $tiddler=<<story>>
/>
<$action-deletetiddler
    $tiddler=<<history>>
/>
<$action-setfield
    $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/text"
    text={{{ [<annotationTiddler>get[annotate-text]] }}}
/>
<$action-setfield
    $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/prefix"
    text={{{ [<annotationTiddler>get[annotate-prefix]] }}}
/>
<$action-setfield
    $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selection/suffix"
    text={{{ [<annotationTiddler>get[annotate-suffix]] }}}
/>
<$let
    selectionText={{{ [<annotationTiddler>get[annotate-text]] }}}
    selectionTrim={{{ [<selectionText>trim[]] }}}
    selectionTrimLowercase={{{ [<selectionTrim>lowercase[]] }}}
    selectionTrimTitlecase={{{ [<selectionTrim>titlecase[]] }}}
    selectionTrimUppercase={{{ [<selectionTrim>uppercase[]] }}}
>
    <$list
        filter="[<selectionTrim>!is[blank]]"
        variable="selectionTrim"
    >

        <$action-popup
            $state=<<selection_popup_title>>
            $coords=<<tv-selection-coords>>
            $floating="yes"
        />
        {{$:/plugins/tidme/read/actions/story}}
    </$list>
</$let>
\end

<$let
    CJKV="[\u2E80-\u9FFF]"
    selection_popup_title={{{ [[$:/state/popup/selection]] [<studyTiddler>] [<qualify>] +[join[/]] }}}
    click_popup_title={{{ [[$:/state/popup/click]] [<studyTiddler>] [<qualify>] +[join[/]] }}}
    story={{{ [[$:/temp/tidme/read/story]addsuffix<studyTiddler>] }}}
    history={{{ [[$:/temp/tidme/read/history]addsuffix<studyTiddler>] }}}
>
    <div style="position:relative;">
        <$dynannotate
            filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]!is[draft]!<currentTiddler>has[annotate-text]]"
            actions=<<click-excerpt-actions>>
            search={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]!<studyTiddler>has[word]] :filter[subfilter{$:/config/Tidme/Filters/decktiddler}] +[get[word]unique[]] :map[!regexp<CJKV>addprefix[(]addsuffix[)]else<currentTiddler>] +[join[|]] }}}
            searchMode="regexp"
            searchCaseSensitive="no"
            searchClass="tc-dynannotation-search-overlay"
            searchMinLength={{$:/config/Search/MinLength}}
        >
            <$dynannotate
                search={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]!<studyTiddler>has[word]] :filter[!subfilter{$:/config/Tidme/Filters/decktiddler}] +[get[word]unique[]] :map[!regexp<CJKV>addprefix[(]addsuffix[)]else<currentTiddler>] +[join[|]] }}}
                searchMode="regexp"
                searchCaseSensitive="no"
                searchClass="tc-dynannotation-search-overlay-animated"
                searchMinLength={{$:/config/Search/MinLength}}
            >
                <div data-selection-actions-title="$:/plugins/tidme/read/actions/selection" data-popup-title=<<selection_popup_title>> data-story=<<story>>  data-history=<<history>> >
                    <div id=<<studyTiddler>> class="dynannotate-chunk">
                        {{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate}}
                    </div>
                </div>
            </$dynannotate>
        </$dynannotate>
        <$reveal
            type="popup"
            tag="div"
            state=<<selection_popup_title>>
            updatePopupPosition="yes"
            position="below"
            class="tmc-annotation-wrapper"
        >
            <$navigator
                story=<<story>>
                history=<<history>>
                openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}}
                openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}}
                relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}
            >
                <section class="tc-story-river" role="main">
                    <div style="dispaly:flex;">
                        <div class="tc-drop-down" style="min-width:0;">
                            {{$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/close||$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/ui/ViewTemplate/button}}
                        </div>
                        <div class="tc-drop-down" style="min-width:0;">
                            <$list
                                filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TidmeRead/annotation]!is[draft]]"
                                template="$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/ui/ViewTemplate/button"
                            />
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <br/>
                    <$list
                        filter="[list<story>]"
                        history=<<history>>
                        storyview={{$:/view}}
                        emptyMessage={{$:/config/EmptyStoryMessage}}
                    >
                        <$let
                            studyTiddler=""
                            deckTiddler=""
                        >
                            <$transclude
                                tiddler={{{ [<currentTiddler>] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] :and[has[title]![$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/tiddler]else[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate]] }}}
                            />
                        </$let>
                    </$list>
                </section>
            </$navigator>
        </$reveal>
    </div>
</$let>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/word":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/word","code-body":"yes","text":"<main style="width:100%;overflow:hidden;">

    />
</main>"}}}
